statements: DELETE FROM machine_learning_results WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_results WHERE model_name='Linear Regression' AND prediction_date='2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_id = 100 AND model_type = 'Regression';
DELETE FROM predictions WHERE prediction_date < '2022-01-01' AND output_result = 'Success';
DELETE FROM predictions WHERE model_id = 3 AND result = 'Success';
DELETE FROM predictions WHERE model_id = 10 AND result = 'success';
